params._lotteryStart: lottery start moment to remember, blocktime format, zero for blocktime
params._numberOfWinners: number of winners of the vault lottery

returns.amounts_: array of amounts (gross, currently in the vault)

params._defoAmount: amount of DeFo to put to vault

lotteryWinners(uint32).details: the ones related to the requested period are put to the storage to return the same number in the future

params._timestamp: moment of the query, zero if now

params._amount: amount to remove from the vault in DEFO (wei precision)

getStaked(uint256).notice: get DEFO amount currently in the vault for a specific yield gem

getStakedAllGems().notice: get DEFO amount currently in the vault for all user's yield gems

getTotalStaked().notice: get amount currently in the vault for sender

getTotalStakedAllUsers().notice: get amount currently in the vault for all protocol users

giveaway(uint256).notice: put defo to the vault from the user's wallet

lotteryWinners(uint32).notice: gets lottery winners in the lottery interval containing _timestamp

unStakeReward(uint256,uint256).notice: remove DEFO amount from the vault back to the unclaimed rewards

userdoc.notice: Vault functionality - unStake, lottery, and getters
